Use the provided learning objectives (spanning Bloom's Taxonomy), active learning components, 4-layer scaffolding, and flashcard schema to create optimized, spaced-repetition-friendly flashcards. Incorporate: - Voter consensus: Completeness (NIST SP 1800-28 series on mobile security with data-in-use encryption via enclaves; techniques: Intel TME/TDX, AMD SEV, SGX, ARM TrustZone, confidential computing, homomorphic encryption, process isolation, Spectre/Meltdown mitigations; cloud examples); pedagogy (Bloom's progression, prior knowledge links to data at rest/transit); big picture (data lifecycle blind spot, zero-trust integration). - Research: Data in processing (RAM/CPU, CIA triad); NIST CSF Protect function. Generate 75 flashcards in JSON array format: [{'id':1, 'front':'...', 'back':{'answer':'...', 'explanation':'...', 'metadata':{...}, 'active_learning_hook':'...'}}, ...]. Balance: Bloom's levels/layers per schema. Ensure distractors are educational. Output ONLY the JSON array.
